name: Tablevibe
headline: All-in-one digital ordering system for restaurants
description:
We are on a mission to help restaurants go direct-to-consumer. Our direct online ordering system enables eateries to easily start their own webshop and sell directly to dine-in, pickup, and delivery customers without the high commission fees of third-party apps.

Our system automatically books drivers from Uber, Doordash, Grab, Foodpanda and Lalamove for a low distance-based fee. In total, restaurants save up to 80% and build their own customer database by processing orders with Tablevibe.

We offer more than just an ordering system. We're creating an ecosystem around digital ordering and leveraging customer insights to maximise sales. Our solutions include innovative cashback programs, referral incentives, and marketing campaigns, combined with a singular platform to manage all online orders and menus. Plus, our feedback surveys are pivotal in growing customer satisfaction and online reviews.

Backed by Global Founders Capital, Y Combinator, and Velocity Ventures, we’re here to redefine your restaurant’s future. Join the thousands of restaurants who are thriving with us by booking a call with one of our restaurant experts at tablevibe.co/democall or by contacting our team via hello@tablevibe.co.

founders.name: Jeroen Rutten, Founder
founders.description:
With 6.5 years of product leadership experience at Google in Dublin, Singapore and Amsterdam, and with a passion for digital product development and entrepreneurship I started Tablevibe.co. 

Tablevibe is the one-stop platform to help restaurants grow. We do this through smarter booking features, capturing guest experiences, and driving loyalty and online reputation.

founders.name: Guido Caldara, Founder
founders.description:
CTO @ tablevibe.co

Tech enthusiast, developer and coding teacher with a management background @ Decathlon. 
I've spent the last few years teaching others how to code by sharing my passion with students from all over the world @ Le Wagon coding school.

I'm in love with building tech products, addicted to ultramarathons and always ready to embrace new challenges.

founders.name: Mathieu Sneep, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder and head of growth @ tablevibe.co. 

I love and live internet businesses. I have ≈10 years of sales and people management experience at both start-ups and multinationals (Google, AdRoll, Fyber) in Europe and Asia.

Trying to live by this motto: ”Twenty years from now, you will be more disappointed by the things you didn’t do than by the ones you did do. Explore. Dream. Discover."

![Tablevibe ordering gif](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1fda3114be548d7b6ebc3/638c8a2d57859f2715db31ce_Demo.gif)
# **Easily accept delivery, pickup and dine-in orders**
Accept any type of order directly from your customers. Reduce commissions by 75%, cut waiting times and build your own customer database.
![Doordash delivery](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1fda3114be548d7b6ebc3/633510fd92b90d39970457b7_FoodPanda-logo.png)![Doordash delivery](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1fda3114be548d7b6ebc3/6294be4091baaa0872d189d2_download%20\(4\).png)![Doordash delivery](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1fda3114be548d7b6ebc3/63353ae02918e2ed42b2de15_Lalamove-Logo.png)![Doordash delivery](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1fda3114be548d7b6ebc3/61efd6258b04e8c6e73cbfa7_DoorDash-01.png)![Doordash delivery](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1fda3114be548d7b6ebc3/63353abd1512f70a8b6d2ef5_Uber-Eats-Emblem.png)
# Sell to 94 million people on GCash
Get listed on GCash Food Hub to sell to millions of delivery and pickup customers instantly. Let dine-in guests scan a QR code to skip the line or order from their table.
![Doordash delivery](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1fda3114be548d7b6ebc3/66e4560e38863afcb4b9dca1_GCash-Logo.png)
![GCash Delivery app](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1fda3114be548d7b6ebc3/66e84e8c672a3a9177d40320_download%20\(2\).gif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1fda3114be548d7b6ebc3/66ab2dc3892ef74867e8f039_Screenshot%202024-08-01%20at%2008.39.41.png)
# **Manage all your delivery apps on one device**
Manage all your digital orders and menus centrally on one device. 
![Doordash delivery](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1fda3114be548d7b6ebc3/66e4560e38863afcb4b9dca1_GCash-Logo.png)![Doordash delivery](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1fda3114be548d7b6ebc3/6735ff34edb3af4b594689c6_download%20\(2\).png)![Doordash delivery](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1fda3114be548d7b6ebc3/633510fd92b90d39970457b7_FoodPanda-logo.png)![Doordash delivery](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1fda3114be548d7b6ebc3/61c1fda3114be541dab6ebe7_Tablevibe%20-%20Logo%20design%205.0%20\(8\).png)
# Turn your social media pages into storefronts
Drive orders from your social media channels by connecting your Instagram, Facebook and Google profiles to Tablevibe.
![Take food orders on social media illustration](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1fda3114be548d7b6ebc3/61eeb057d5f74d230250139c_Group%2016687%20\(1\).png)
# Launch marketing campaigns to grow repeat sales
Manage your entire customer database in Tablevibe. Launch referral campaigns and effortlessly reward loyalty with targeted SMS offers.
![Consumer engagement on autopilot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1fda3114be548d7b6ebc3/61f8fc842c38420bcc06db31_Group%2016793%20\(2\).png)
# **Capture and accelerate customer ratings**
Use QR code surveys to collect feedback, names, and email addresses from your customers. Happy guests share their 5 star rating on Google. All survey respondents gets an incentive to reorder directly with you.
![Tablevibe feedback surveys, incentivize direct orders](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1fda3114be548d7b6ebc3/67360b946e7acfcb4d3fd8e2_Rectangle%20\(1\).png)
![Tablevibe feedback surveys, incentivize direct orders](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1fda3114be548d7b6ebc3/61efdd2359960f342cc65fde_Group%2016758%20\(1\).png)
# What restaurants say about Tablevibe
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61cddc8ce0282e06b53736ed/66e41bb50d3a8ee96aadc709_Screenshot%202024-09-13%20at%2011.22.06.png)
Tablevibe now powers our digital storefront Momentfood.com, and our customers love the seamless user experience along with the efficient, timely deliveries. As a result, we’ve seen digital sales grow significantly.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61cddc8ce0282e06b53736ed/66e41bbcc979e15e1b234a5b_TMG-TYPE-LOGO-BLACK-11.png)

Co-founder at The Moment Group
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61cddc8ce0282e06b53736ed/66e41b03e9e7db5ba59eb0e6_lisa-rongquillo.webp)
Tablevibe helps us grow our margins significantly and accelerates our customer relationships and online reviews. Their solutions are incredibly effective and easy-to-use. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61cddc8ce0282e06b53736ed/66e41b4bed9b0064240346a5_1696916169The%20Bistro%20Group%20promo%20voucher%20gift%20certificate.png)

Tablevibe is a 10/10 digital ordering system. It has helps us significantly reduce costs, build our own customer database and it provides our customers with an excellent user experience.

By clicking **“Accept All Cookies”** , you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. View our [Privacy Policy](https://www.tablevibe.co/<#>) for more information.
[Preferences](https://www.tablevibe.co/<#>)[Accept](https://www.tablevibe.co/<#>)
Privacy Preference Center
When you visit websites, they may store or retrieve data in your browser. This storage is often necessary for the basic functionality of the website. The storage may be used for marketing, analytics, and personalization of the site, such as storing your preferences. Privacy is important to us, so you have the option of disabling certain types of storage that may not be necessary for the basic functioning of the website. Blocking categories may impact your experience on the website.
[Reject all cookies](https://www.tablevibe.co/<#>)[Allow all cookies](https://www.tablevibe.co/<#>)
Manage Consent Preferences by Category
Essential
**Always Active**
These items are required to enable basic website functionality.
Marketing
Essential
These items are used to deliver advertising that is more relevant to you and your interests. They may also be used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. Advertising networks usually place them with the website operator’s permission.
Personalization
Essential
These items allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your user name, language, or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features. For example, a website may provide you with local weather reports or traffic news by storing data about your current location.
Analytics
Essential
These items help the website operator understand how its website performs, how visitors interact with the site, and whether there may be technical issues. This storage type usually doesn’t collect information that identifies a visitor.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Tablevibe**

Founded in 2020 and based in Singapore, Tablevibe is revolutionizing the way restaurants connect with their customers through a comprehensive digital ordering system. This innovative platform began with a mission to enable restaurants to sell directly to consumers, bypassing high commission fees typically associated with third-party delivery apps.

**What They Do:**
Tablevibe's system not only facilitates direct online orders for dine-in, pickup, and delivery but also integrates with established delivery services like Uber Eats, DoorDash, and Foodpanda, automatically assigning drivers as needed for a modest distance-based fee. This can result in restaurants saving up to 80% on delivery costs, while also giving them the power to build their own customer databases — a valuable asset in today’s market.

**Features and Benefits:**
Tablevibe offers an all-in-one ecosystem designed to enhance the digital ordering experience. Their suite of services includes:
- **Cashback Programs & Referral Incentives:** Encouraging repeat business through targeted marketing strategies.
- **Customer Feedback Surveys:** Gathering insights to improve customer satisfaction and boost online reviews.
- **Single Platform Management:** A centralized system to handle all online orders and menu updates.

Unlike traditional systems, Tablevibe charges no setup or fixed fees and works on a zero percent commission model, positioning itself as a cost-effective solution for restaurants of all sizes.

**Investment and Growth:**
Backed by reputable investors including Y Combinator and Global Founders Capital, Tablevibe is scaling quickly. With a team of around 10 passionate employees, they are committed to helping thousands of restaurants grow their sales, cut costs, and manage customer relationships effectively.

**Final Thoughts:**
In an era where digital transformation is crucial, Tablevibe provides restaurants with the tools they need to thrive independently. If you're curious to see how this might work for your establishment, consider booking a demo or reaching out to their team at hello@tablevibe.co. Discover more on their website at [Tablevibe.co](https://www.tablevibe.co).

---

If you're a restaurant looking for a way to enhance customer experience and profitability, Tablevibe could be the partner you’ve been waiting for.
